org.mt4j.components.clipping

Class FillPaint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mt4j.components.clipping.FillPaint

  • public class FillPaint
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class FillPaint. If added to a component, the specified fillpaint will be drawn where the original component would have been drawn.
    NOTE: A fillpaint can only be used for a single component.
    NOTE: This is only supported by the OpenGL renderer!
    Author:
    Christopher Ruff

      • setShape

        public void setShape(AbstractVisibleComponent shape)
        Sets the shape to be fill painted. Usually this is called automatically when the paint is added to a shape. So this method should not be invoked directly.
        Parameters:
        shape - the new shape
